div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1155 Asia Minor, western?, 1935-1936 (85) Burial: c. 600-590 B.C. (M) Contents: 11+ EL Ephesus?: 1 twelfth; 1 forty-eighth Lydia (lion hd.): 5 thirds; 1 twelfth Unc. mint (lion scalp): 1 forty-eighth (horse hd.): 1 forty-eighth (flying bird): 1 ninety-sixth Disposition: New York 3 (Ephesus 1, Lydia 1, unc. horse hd. 1)
